languages.text: "Самое время. Отриньте Дом, что видел в вас бездушное "дитя" и врага. Пусть Атлас станет вашим щитом — ни ксеносы, ни навигаторы не посмеют причинить вам вред, зная, что вы можете уничтожить Монолит душ силой мысли".

traits.locale_text: "Самое время. Отринье Дом, что видел в вас бездушное "дитя" и врага. Пусть Атлас станет вашим щитом — ни ксеносы, ни Навигаторы не посмеют причинить вам вред, зная, что вы можете уничтожить Камень Душ силой мысли".

languages.text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."
languages.original_text: "Самое время. Отриньте Дом, что видел в вас бездушное "дитя" и врага. Пусть Атлас станет вашим щитом — ни ксеносы, ни навигаторы не посмеют причинить вам вред, зная, что вы можете уничтожить Монолит душ силой мысли".

traits.locale_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but 'the Child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

"The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but 'the Child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

"The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but 'the Child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

"The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

"The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

languages.text: 「今こそ、その時だ。君を魂のない『御子』や敵としての扱いしかしない実家とは縁を切れ。アトラスには君の盾になってもらえばいい。君がスピリット・モノリスを心一つで壊せるとわかっているのだから、異種族にも航宙士にも脅かされることはないだろう」
languages.original_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

traits.locale_text: 「今こそ、その時だ。君を魂のない『御子』や敵としての扱いしかしない実家とは縁を切れ。アトラスには君の盾になってもらえばいい。君がスピリット・モノリスを心一つで壊せるとわかっているのだから、異種族にも航宙士にも脅かされることはないだろう」

languages.text: “这种时候恰恰再合适不过了。放弃你的家族吧，他们要么把你视为任意摆布的所谓‘圣子’，要么把你当做敌人。就让圣仪成为你的盾牌吧，无论是异形还是导航者，他们谁都不敢贸然对你出手，因为他们知道，你随时可以用意念摧毁这块巨型灵魂石。”
languages.original_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

traits.locale_text: “这种时候恰恰再合适不过了。放弃你的家族吧，他们要么把你视为‘圣子’，要么把你当做敌人。就让圣仪成为你的盾牌吧，无论是异形还是导航者，他们谁都不敢贸然对你出手，因为他们知道，你随时可以用意念摧毁这块巨型灵魂石。”

languages.text: « Au contraire, c'est le moment idéal. Rejetez cette maison qui ne vous a jamais vue autrement que comme une enfant stupide, voire une ennemie. Servez-vous de l'Atlas comme d'un bouclier, car ni les xénos ni les navigateurs n'oseront s'en prendre à vous en sachant que vous pouvez détruire le Monolithe aux esprits par la pensée. »
languages.original_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

traits.locale_text: « Au contraire, c'est le moment idéal. Rejetez cette maison qui ne vous a jamais vue autrement que comme une enfant, voire une ennemie. Servez-vous de l'Atlas comme d'un bouclier, car ni les xénos ni les navigateurs n'oseront s'en prendre à vous en sachant que vous pouvez détruire le Monolithe aux esprits par la pensée. »

languages.text: «Este es el momento perfecto. Renuncie a la casa que no la considera más que una "niña" sin espíritu y su enemiga. Deje que el Atlas sea su escudo, pues ni los xenos ni los Navegantes se arriesgarán a atacarla sabiendo que puede destruir el Monolito Espiritual con su mente».
languages.original_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

traits.locale_text: «Este es el momento perfecto. Renuncie a la casa que no la considera más que su "niña" y su enemiga. Deje que el Atlas sea su escudo, pues ni los xenos ni los Navegantes se arriesgarán a atacarla sabiendo que puede destruir el Monolito Espiritual con su mente».

languages.text: "Es ist genau der richtige Zeitpunkt. Widersagt Eurem Haus, das Euch nur als geistloses 'Kind' und als Feind sieht. Lasst den Atlas als Euren Schild dienen, denn weder die Xenos noch die Navigatoren werden es riskieren, Euch zu bedrohen. Sie wissen, dass Ihr den Geistesmonolithen mit Eurem Verstand zerstören könnt."
languages.original_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist genau der richtige Zeitpunkt. Widersagt Eurem Haus, das Euch nur als 'das Kind' und als Feind sieht. Lasst den Atlas als Euren Schild dienen, denn weder die Xenos noch die Navigatoren werden es riskieren, Euch zu bedrohen. Sie wissen, dass Ihr den Geistesmonolithen mit Eurem Verstand zerstören könnt."

languages.text: "Tam da sırası. Seni sadece ruhsuz bir 'çocuk' ve bir düşman olarak gören Hanenden feragat et. Atlas kalkanın olsun, sonuçta zihninle Ruh Monoliti'ni yok edebileceğini bildikleri için ne zenolar ne de Rotacılar seni tehdit etmeyi göze alamaz."
languages.original_text: "The time is exactly right. Renounce your House that sees you as nothing but a spiritless 'child' and an enemy. Let the Atlas act as your shield, for neither the xenos nor the Navigators will risk threatening you, knowing that you can destroy the Spirit Monolith with your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Tam da sırası. Seni sadece ruhsuz bir 'çocuk' ve bir düşman olarak gören Hanenden feragat et. Atlas, senin kalkanın olsun; sonuçta zihninle Ruh Monoliti'ni yok edebileceğini bildikleri için, ne zenolar ne de Rotacılar seni tehdit etmeyi göze alamaz."
